name: SUNRISE ON THE RED SAND DUNES INTENSE EDP 100 ML (3.38 FL. OZ).
description:
Eau de parfum. Inspired by the deep, warm feeling of a golden sunset, this new, more intense version captures the warmth and addictive facets of fir balsam and labdanum, evoking the mesmerizing transition from day to night.

Fragrance pyramid reveals vibrant notes of bergamot and ginger revealed by a radiant halo of mandarin. As the fragrance unfolds, the base notes reveal a rich blend of amber, intertwined with the captivating aromas of orange blossom and black currant.
